"Stash House" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Stash House" (feat. OJ Da Juiceman) [Hook:] I'm a stash house with shoes on I'm a stash house with truves on I'm a stash house with jewels on Walking talking stash house, I'm a million I'm a stash house with shoes on I'm a stash house with truves on I'm a stash house with jewels on I'm a walking talking motherfuckin c'hoppa throwin I'm a walkin talkin motherfuckin stash house I'm a walkin talkin motherfuckin stash house I got shooters round me all the time, like a stash house I'm a dope cookin kush, smoking rubber band boss [Verse 1:] I'm a rubber band boss but I can sit us out Whip these houses for a brick, AK in the stash house Trap just like MacDonald's, you pull up, pull off And he break a Bentley, let the drum go off Great it's not the gas on some kush man cloud 4500 for a bag right now Say you want a 50 over the head, I'm on a cloud Then it's back to the crash, great all the peas down All flows in the semi, few racks in my stash house In the kitchen cookin, man my shoes is stack house My watch is stash house, my chain is stash house So everything I buy just know Young Juiceman came for [Hook:] I'm a stash house with shoes on I'm a stash house with truves on I'm a stash house with jewels on Walking talking stash house, I'm a million I'm a stash house with shoes on I'm a stash house with truves on I'm a stash house with jewels on I'm a walking talking motherfuckin choppa throwin I'm a Said you rob a stash house but you got some pennies in it Yo wardrobe yea, you shot the JC pent didn't it Cooked on the grill like Denis, chicken like Wendy's Then I'm blowin black lamb with some blue and black panties Got a white girl that throw that pussy, I call er Mrs. PayDemandIt And she love that gleam but the bitch so nasty Stash house mansion, stash house panties I'm the trap Spielberg, you a stash actress Yo kid ain't half of a mill then that shit ain'tworth stashin You're still begging for a deal, still got me laughing Steel tall boots, close to 10 toes traffic Sell a quarter for 100 then go full metal jacket It was a nigga from the 6 state down 2 bricks He a owe a nigga that, he won't give a nigga shit Some bell is worth a life, watch when the light hit And yo bitch switch cause she on a dope man dick [Hook:] I'm a stash house with shoes on I'm a stash house with truves on I'm a stash house with jewels on Walking talking stash house, I'm a million I'm a stash house with shoes
